meanings.definition: The state of being sad or mournful.
meanings.sent1: Her dolefulnesses were evident in her tear-streaked face.
meanings.sent2: The dolefulnesses in the room were palpable after the tragic news.
meanings.sent3: Despite her dolefulnesses, she tried to cheer up her friends with a joke.
meanings.sent4: The dolefulnesses of the rainy day matched her somber mood.
meanings.sent5: The dolefulnesses in her eyes spoke volumes about her inner pain.

meanings.definition: The quality of expressing sorrow or grief.
meanings.sent1: The artist captured the dolefulnesses of the scene with his brush strokes.
meanings.sent2: Her music was filled with dolefulnesses that touched the hearts of all who listened.
meanings.sent3: The dolefulnesses in his voice made the audience shed a tear.
meanings.sent4: The dolefulnesses of the melody echoed the sadness in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The dolefulnesses of the poem resonated with those who had experienced loss.
